title: ITT: We post what kind of car we drive.
body:
If you have a picture then great! If not just find one on the internets.

For me my car is a Navy Blue 4-Door 2007 Hyundai Accent.

http://zombdrive.com/images/2007-hyundai-accent-1.jpg

Mines a bit darker but it's close enough.

If you don't have a car I will take a drawing of Altaria instead. :^)
